Params[3]: Commandant, are you here for Lee?

Params[4]: I have something that needs repairing.

Params[3]: Now that you mention it, Lee did ask me about what you liked a few days ago...

Params[2]: It's a sign that we get along well.

Params[3]: Your emotions are written all over your face.
I never thought human emotions could be this strong and penetrate through an explosion-proof door.
Usually, nothing can physically block these types of things.
Is that so? I think you should carry out some research on "human emotions." You can start with Commandant.

Params[2]: How are you going to research that?
Params[4]: Are you going to experiment on me?

Params[3]: It wouldn't be research if you knew about it.
By the way, give me your timer, it broke, right?
